charinfo.name: Chojuro (S)
charinfo.description: Chojuro (S) confidence is building as the war rages on. The longer it lasts the stronger Chojuro (S) becomes.

abilities.name: Hiramekarei Strider
abilities.description: Chojuro (S) uses Hiramekarei Strider on all enemies dealing 10 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Hiramekarei Hammer
abilities.description: Chojuro (S) uses Hiramekarei Hammer on one enemy. That enemy will lose all destructible defense and then take 50 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Hiramekarei Kenjutsu
abilities.description: Chojuro (S) uses Hiramekarei Kenjutsu. All enemy physical skills used on Chojuro (S) will be countered and that enemy will be dealt 20 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Hiramekarei Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Chojuro (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
